public static boolean checkExposed(java.util.List<com.dukascopy.api.IOrder> orders)
Check to see if there is any risk exposure

Parameters:
orders - a list of orders to scan
Returns:
true if there is exposed risk, false is not

getExposed

public static java.util.List<com.dukascopy.api.IOrder> getExposed(java.util.List<com.dukascopy.api.IOrder> orders)
Get a list of opened positions that have a risk exposure, i.e. stop price below opening price for long, and vice versa

Parameters:
orders - a list of orders to scan
Returns:
a list of risk-exposed filled orders

placeMarketOrder

public java.util.concurrent.Future<com.dukascopy.api.IOrder> placeMarketOrder(java.lang.String prefix,
                                                                              java.lang.String suffix,
                                                                              com.dukascopy.api.Instrument instrument,
                                                                              com.dukascopy.api.IEngine.OrderCommand orderCmd,
                                                                              double amount,
                                                                              double stopLossSize)
Send a market order in its own thread

Parameters:
prefix - a prefix for the order label
suffix - a suffix for the order label
instrument - the purchasing instrument
orderCmd - BUY or SELL
amount - the amount to buy, in millions, minimum 0.001
stopLossSize - size of the stop loss, in scale of instrument
See Also:
placeMarketOrder(String, String, Instrument, com.dukascopy.api.IEngine.OrderCommand, double, double, double, double)

Send a market order in its own thread

Parameters:
prefix - a prefix for the order label
suffix - a suffix for the order label
instrument - the purchasing instrument
orderCmd - BUY or SELL
amount - the amount to buy, in millions, minimum 0.001
stopLossPrice - stop loss price, 0 for no stop
targetPrice - target price, 0 for no target
See Also:

                                                                              double stopLossPrice,
                                                                              double trailStep,
                                                                              double targetPrice)
Send a market order in its own thread

Parameters:
prefix - a prefix for the order label
suffix - a suffix for the order label
instrument - the purchasing instrument
orderCmd - BUY or SELL
amount - the amount to buy, in millions, minimum 0.001
stopLossPrice - stop loss price, 0 for no stop
trailStep - sets a trailing step to the order
targetPrice - target price, 0 for no target
See Also:
IEngine.submitOrder(String, Instrument, com.dukascopy.api.IEngine.OrderCommand, double, double, double, double, double)
